Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: Do not spend too much time on this, do something reasonable.

Action.author: mzk-vct
Action.body: *Stores* and *PoolManagers* hierarchies should be simplified. It may take a lot of time, especially for *PoolManager*.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: I have looked at the PR. It does not look like there is much for QA to do with this ticket so I am moving it on.
